meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Todd LaPlace Tori Campbell Dhruv Srinivasachar Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7850.

td.p: Todd LaPlace, an accountant from Dublin, Ohio
Tori Campbell, an attorney from Chicago, Illinois
Dhruv Srinivasachar, a medical and doctoral student from Richmond, Virginia (whose 1-day cash winnings total $17,600)

tr.td: 1984 AT THE MOVIES WITH LEONARD MALTIN
RELATIONSHIPS
PRESIDENTIAL FIRSTS
NOT TO BE CONFUSED
ANIMAL ODDITIES
STARTS OR ENDS WITH A BODY PART
